snippet: In Utah and nearby states, rodeo children — weaned on mutton-busting and goat-tying — grow up in a culture that prizes riding sheep over Facebook updates.
abstract: Rodeo children in Utah and nearby states, where they are weaned on mutton-busting and goat-tying, grow up in a culture that prizes riding sheep over Facebook updates and video games; host of factors are threaten youth rodeo, however, and rodeo organizations nationwide are scrambling for members.
lead_paragraph: In Utah and nearby states, rodeo children — weaned on mutton-busting and goat-tying — grow up in a culture that prizes riding sheep over Facebook updates.

headline.seo: Youth Rodeo In Utah Keeps Old West Alive
headline.main: Where Riding and Wrangling Beat Virtual Adventures
headline.print_headline: Where Riding and Wrangling Beat Virtual Adventures
